named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_CUSTOMER_ADDRESSES_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ca FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.core.domain.CustomerAddress ca WHERE ca.customer.id = :customerId AND ca.address.isActive = TRUE AND (ca.archiveStatus.archived IS NULL OR ca.archiveStatus.archived = :archived) ORDER BY ca.id

named-query.name: BC_FIND_DEFAULT_ADDRESS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ca FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.core.domain.CustomerAddress ca WHERE ca.customer.id = :customerId AND ca.address.isDefault = TRUE

named-query.name: BC_READ_DEFAULT_ADDRESS_IDS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ca.address.id FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.core.domain.CustomerAddress ca WHERE ca.customer.id = :customerId AND ca.address.isDefault = TRUE

named-query.name: BC_CLEAR_DEFAULT_ADDRESS_BY_IDS
named-query.query: UPDATE org.broadleafcommerce.profile.core.domain.Address a SET a.isDefault = false WHERE a.id in :addressIds
